funFacts.label: Peak season
funFacts.detail: Q1 was a full-on launch mode: 105 PRs merged before spring even started.

funFacts.label: The Great Cleanup
funFacts.detail: Biggest single swing: deleted 8,582 lines in dl_object_detection — the kind of spring cleaning that makes CI breathe easier.

funFacts.label: Docs that ship
funFacts.detail: Dropped a 913-line Argo Rollouts guide in argocd — turning tribal knowledge into copy-paste superpowers.

funFacts.label: Human load balancer
funFacts.detail: Most-reviewed teammate: @ylavi-cloudinary with 77 reviews — basically pair-programming at scale.

funFacts.label: Net line wizardry
funFacts.detail: More lines removed than added this year (+9,392 / -12,295). Refactors, migrations, and pruning like a pro.

bigRocks.title: Cross-Account Backup Vault: DR Mode Activated
bigRocks.impact: Built a full cross-account AWS Backup solution for Aurora RDS—vaults, KMS, IAM, and plans—locking in a real DR safety net.

bigRocks.title: Canary Brain for Argo Rollouts
bigRocks.impact: Shipped Datadog-powered canary analysis templates so rollouts can self-validate before users ever feel a bump.

bigRocks.title: Terraform: VPC Endpoints on Easy Mode
bigRocks.impact: Made VPC endpoints configurable and repeatable, then wired staging with the endpoints it needed—cleaner infra, fewer surprises.

bigRocks.title: ExternalDNS: The Great Chart Migration
bigRocks.impact: Migrated ExternalDNS off the deprecated Bitnami chart to Kubernetes SIGs and fixed config format to stop DNS record conflicts.

bigRocks.title: MCP Server Lands in the Cluster
bigRocks.impact: Added the Kubernetes resources for MCP server deployment (RBAC, service account, deployment, service) and wired it into the platform.

quarterlyActivity.highlights: Migration + GPU + GitOps season: MMS infra moves, nodepool tuning, and a ton of platform momentum.
Stability sprint: capacity tweaks, cert changes, and platform guardrails across clusters.
Observability & operations: n8n fixes, MCP rollout, and signal-cleaning in NGINX logs.
Infra polish with impact: backups, canary templates, and VPC endpoint flexibility to close the year strong.

topRepos.name: k8s-infra
topRepos.funFact: From VPC endpoints to Karpenter + GPU node wrangling—this repo was your control panel for keeping clusters fast and sane.

topRepos.name: argocd
topRepos.funFact: You turned GitOps into a safety system: rollouts analysis templates, production ApplicationSet edits, and clean removals with purpose.

topRepos.name: devops
topRepos.funFact: Automation headquarters—backup workflows, monitoring fixes, and even AI review automation (because you optimize everything).

yearInReview.headline: The Year of Safer Deploys
yearInReview.tagline: 177 PRs merged • 138 reviews • 5 repos • 9,392 lines added / 12,295 removed — shipping cleaner infra, smarter rollouts, and real DR muscle
